rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg001
rows.name:
What's up, Azami? Didn't you want
to see the view from here?

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg002
rows.name:
What's up, Azami? Didn't you want
to see the view from here?

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg003
rows.name:
What's the matter, Azami? Didn't you
want to see the view from here?

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg004
rows.name:
What's up, Azami? Didn't you want
to see the view from here?

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg005
rows.name: Never mind. I'm done.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg006
rows.name: You're done...? Had enough already?"

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg007
rows.name: You say you're done, but did you actually look properly?

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg008
rows.name: What do you mean? Did you properly look at the scenery?

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg009
rows.name: What's that about? Did you really take a good look?

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg010
rows.name:
It's no fun now. Your little fan club's
ruined the mood already.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg011
rows.name:
Can't we make this a private date
and ditch the others?

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg012
rows.name: Wha-? A date?

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg013
rows.name: Wha-? A date?!

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg014
rows.name: A date? With me?

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg015
rows.name: A date? Well, this is sudden!

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg016
rows.name: Tee hee. What's wrong with that?

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg017
rows.name:
I want to get to know you.
Intimately.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg018
rows.name:
Just the two of us, dining on fine food,
gazing out at the sky above and
talking for hours...

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg019
rows.name: Hold on! Why just the two of you?

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg020
rows.name: Haha! Something wrong?

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg021
rows.name:
We're Driver and Blade. It's only
natural that we'd be alone together.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg022
rows.name:
It's not natural. We're all part of the
team too. We should all stick together.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg023
rows.name:
Thanks but no thanks, doll. I want
to talk to my Driver in private.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg044
rows.name: What I like, huh... I guess Tartari-yaki...

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg045
rows.name: My favorite food... probably Cream Orange Parlata...

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg046
rows.name: What I like, huh... I prefer Cataretta...

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg047
rows.name:
What I like? 
Well... Almabara meat in sweet soy sauce, yeah...

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0001
rows.name: *sigh*

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0002
rows.name:
Hey, Drivercheeks. What do you think
about all this?

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0003
rows.name: How should I reply, I wonder?

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0004
rows.name: I like being together with everyone.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0005
rows.name: I can spend some time with Azami.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0006
rows.name: What would be the proper response?

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0007
rows.name: I want us all to have a good time.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0008
rows.name: I could spend some time with Azami.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0009
rows.name: What the heck should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0010
rows.name: I'd prefer everyone to be together.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0011
rows.name: I don't mind spending time with Azami.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0012
rows.name: How should I respond?

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0013
rows.name: Hey, the more the merrier!

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0014
rows.name: I could spend some time with Azami.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0101
rows.name: Oh... So that's how it is.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0102
rows.name: Too bad for you, Azami.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0103
rows.name:
Oh don't worry. I'm only just getting
warmed up.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0104
rows.name:
So, my cutie pie, tell me...what do you
like to eat?

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0105
rows.name:
Can't get enough of that delicious-yet-
reasonably-priced grease bomb...

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0106
rows.name: Haha... Oh, just you wait and see.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0107
rows.name: What are you planning?

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0108
rows.name:
Why, I'm going to make breakfast
every morning.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0109
rows.name:
Right now, my precious Driver may
prefer to hang out with friends...

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0110
rows.name:
But soon, it'll be all too clear that
I'm more devoted than any of you.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0111
rows.name:
Believe me, once you get a taste of
the real Azami, she's all you can think
about, day and night!

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0112
rows.name: I get it. You're sick, huh.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0113
rows.name: Hahaha! I guess I'm love-sick.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0114
rows.name:
This is not funny. You are thinking
of using drugs or something
in that breakfast, aren't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0115
rows.name:
Hahaha! Look forward to it,
my Driver cutie...

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0116
rows.name: Just...be careful with the food...

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0201
rows.name: You would?!

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0202
rows.name: Then let's head out. Right this second!

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0203
rows.name:
First I want to try that famous noodle
soup from Avaritia...

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0204
rows.name:
And then, after watching the sun set
beneath the Cloud Sea, we'll charter
the Uzushio and sail to Gula!

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0205
rows.name:
On the journey, we will dine
under the stars to the dulcet
tones of Nopon music.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0206
rows.name:
Then, after our three-day cruise, we'll
stay over in a luxury suite in Torigo.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0207
rows.name:
Wait a second! What is this,
some kind of honeymoon?!

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0208
rows.name:
We don't have time for your wild
fantasies. See, even your Driver
is looking bemused.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0209
rows.name: I don't hear any objections.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0210
rows.name:
Trust me, you'll make your own Driver
hate you if you carry on like this.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0211
rows.name: What...?!

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0212
rows.name:
I can see how much you love your
Driver, really I do. But it can't all be
one-sided.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0213
rows.name: ...I suppose you're right.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0214
rows.name: As long as you get it.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0215
rows.name:
I'm not going to stop you going out
together, but...have some restraint,okay?

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0216
rows.name: All right...

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0217
rows.name:
I suppose I could bring myself
to forget the luxury suite and
just make do with the cruise.

rows.label: kizunatalk068_msg0218
rows.name: She doesn't get it at all!
